price: 56. Y quienes tomen por aliados y protectores a Al-lah, a Su Mensajero y a los creyentes (será de los partidarios de Al-lah), y los partidarios de Al-lah serán los vencedores.
arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman yatawalla al-laha warasūlahu wa-alladhīna āmanū fa-inna ḥiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghālibūna
